definition[0]: the passing of something is the fact that it has ended
example[0]: The old regime was defeated, and few people mourned its passing.
definition[1]: the passing of a person is their death – use this when you want to avoid using the word ‘death’
example[1]: Nothing could fill the gap in her life left by his passing.
definition[2]: going past a place or person
example[3]: A passing motorist stopped to help.
definition[3]: a passing thought or feeling is short and not very serious
example[4]: He had only ever shown a passing interest in sport.
definition[4]: a passing remark is one that you make while you are talking about something else
example[5]: He made only a passing reference to her achievements.
